pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṁ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovadanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.5: “Yampi mayaṁ, ayye, gaccheyyāma ovādassa kāraṇā, ayyā chabbaggiyā idheva āgantvā amhe ovadantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.8: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ovādaṁ na gacchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:1.14.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc58:2.1.9: Ovādāya vā saṁvāsāya vā na gacchissāmīti dhuraṁ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
